Package PizzaPackage

Class Hawaiian

java.lang.Object
PizzaPackage.Pizza
PizzaPackage.Hawaiian
public class Hawaiian
extends Pizza
Hawaiian pizza object used to build pies of type Hawaiian. This class extends Pizza and has its own preset toppings to be used.
Author:
Rizwan Chowdhury, Tin Fung
